articles.description: The fund had announced the first close at $60 million in November last year.
articles.content:
Fireside Ventures has raised $118 million (Rs 863 crore) toward the final close of its second fund, including a $18 million (Rs 113 crore) green shoe option, its top executive said.

articles.title: L&T construction arm bags orders worth up to Rs 5,000 crore in Bangladesh - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The power transmission and distribution business of Larsen & Toubro has won a slew of transmission line orders in Bangladesh, the company said in a regulatory filing.
articles.content:
Larsen & Toubro (L&T) on Wednesday said its construction arm has bagged orders worth up to Rs 5,000 crore in Bangladesh.
